gordon_c.name: Gordon Cunningham
gordon_c.summary: Family patriarch. Died in a car crash in 2004 which also killed his second wife, Helen. Appeared in a dream sequence in 2008.

angela_c.name: Angela Cunningham
angela_c.summary: Gordon's ex-wife and mother to Dawn, Jude, Cindy, and Max. Made her last appearance in 2008.

dawn_c.name: Dawn Cunningham
dawn_c.summary: Died of leukemia on Christmas Day 1997. Had an affair with Jack Osborne, resulting in daughter Bethany.

jude_c.name: Jude Cunningham
jude_c.summary: Appeared 1996-1998, with a brief return in 2016. Known for brushes with the law.

cindy_c.name: Cindy Cunningham
cindy_c.summary: Long-running character with a history of scheming and dramatic relationships. Mother to Holly. Married Tony Hutchinson.

max_c.name: Max Cunningham
max_c.summary: Tragically killed in 2008 by Niall Rafferty, moments after marrying Steph Dean.

helen_c.name: Helen Richardson
helen_c.summary: Gordon's second wife and mother to Tom. Had an affair with Tony Hutchinson. Died in the 2004 car crash with Gordon.

tom_c.name: Tom Cunningham
tom_c.summary: Long-running character who grew up on screen. Became a father to Steph Cunningham-Lomax with Peri Lomax in an underage sex storyline.

bethany_j.name: Bethany Johnson
bethany_j.summary: Daughter of Dawn Cunningham and Jack Osborne, given up for adoption.

holly_c.name: Holly Cunningham
holly_c.summary: Daughter of Cindy Cunningham and Lee Stanley.

jack_o.name: Jack Osborne
jack_o.summary: Family patriarch and long-term owner of The Dog in the Pond. Had numerous marriages and affairs, including one with Dawn Cunningham. Involved in a fake death scam and confessed to a past murder.

celia_o.name: Celia Osborne
celia_o.summary: Jack's first wife. Divorced him in 1997 after discovering his affair with Dawn and left the village.

ruth_o.name: Ruth Osborne
ruth_o.summary: Daughter of Jack and Celia. Married Kurt Benson. Made several brief returns to the village over the years.

darren_o.name: Darren Osborne
darren_o.summary: Evolved from a troubled youth to a complex character dealing with gambling addiction, fatherhood, and prison. Father to JJ, Frankie, Oscar, and Morgan.

jill_p.name: Jill Patrick
jill_p.summary: Jack's second wife. Died from a brain tumor in 2000.

frankie_o.name: Frankie Dean
frankie_o.summary: Jack's third wife. Fostered Barry Newton with Jack.

oscar_o.name: Oscar Osborne
oscar_o.summary: Son of Darren and Nancy. A central storyline focused on his deafness and subsequent cochlear implant surgery.

myra_m.name: Myra McQueen
myra_m.summary: The chaotic and loving matriarch of the sprawling McQueen clan. Mother to numerous children, including Niall, Jacqui, Mercedes, Tina, Carmel, and John Paul.

jacqui_m.name: Jacqui McQueen
jacqui_m.summary: A tough and resilient McQueen known for dramatic relationships. Was raped by Gilly, struggled with infertility, and fled the country in 2012 to escape gangster Trevor Royale.

mercedes_m.name: Mercedes McQueen
mercedes_m.summary: One of the show's most iconic and dramatic characters. Known for numerous affairs, being kidnapped by Silas, faking her own death, and murdering Dr. Browning in self-defense.

tina_r.name: Tina Reilly
tina_r.summary: Daughter of Myra. Tragically killed in the church explosion set by her vengeful brother Niall Rafferty in 2008.

carmel_m.name: Carmel McQueen
carmel_m.summary: Daughter of Myra. Died heroically in the 2014 party train crash while saving Theresa from Sonny Valentine.

johnpaul_m.name: John Paul McQueen
johnpaul_m.summary: Central to a groundbreaking coming-out storyline with Craig Dean. Later involved in a male rape storyline with Finn O'Connor. Left for Singapore in 2016.

theresa_m.name: Theresa McQueen
theresa_m.summary: Shot and killed Calvin Valentine in 2010. Had children with Calvin and Dodger Savage. Left the village in 2015.

niall_r.name: Niall Rafferty
niall_r.summary: Myra's secret, vengeful son. His storyline culminated in the 2008 church explosion that killed Tina Reilly and Max Cunningham.

celine_m.name: Celine McQueen
celine_m.summary: Daughter of Reenie. Murdered by serial killer Cameron Campbell in 2016.

cleo_m.name: Cleo McQueen
cleo_m.summary: Daughter of Reenie. Was at the center of a historical sexual abuse storyline involving Pete Buchanan.

porsche_m.name: Porsche McQueen
porsche_m.summary: Daughter of Reenie. Revealed the historical sexual abuse she and Cleo suffered at the hands of Pete Buchanan.

goldie_m.name: Goldie McQueen
goldie_m.summary: Daughter of Breda McQueen, introduced in 2016. Mother of twins Prince and Hunter.

timelineEvents.title: Dawn's Affair with Jack Osborne
timelineEvents.description: Dawn Cunningham has an affair with the much older Jack Osborne, leading to the birth of their daughter, Bethany, who is given up for adoption.

timelineEvents.title: Death of Dawn Cunningham
timelineEvents.description: In a tragic Christmas storyline, original character Dawn Cunningham dies of leukemia.

timelineEvents.title: Cindy's Return & Scam
timelineEvents.description: Cindy Cunningham returns to the village and scams her brother Max and his friend OB out of money.

timelineEvents.title: Gordon & Helen's Fatal Crash
timelineEvents.description: Family patriarch Gordon Cunningham suffers a heart attack while driving, causing a car crash that kills both him and his wife Helen.

timelineEvents.title: The McQueens Arrive
timelineEvents.description: The chaotic, female-led McQueen family arrives in Hollyoaks, quickly establishing themselves as a major force in the village.

timelineEvents.title: John Paul & Craig ("McDean")
timelineEvents.description: John Paul McQueen begins a groundbreaking affair with his best friend Craig Dean, a storyline that becomes hugely popular with fans.

timelineEvents.title: Death of Max Cunningham
timelineEvents.description: Moments after marrying Steph Dean, Max Cunningham is run over and killed by Niall Rafferty, devastating the Cunningham family.

timelineEvents.title: Niall's Revenge & Church Explosion
timelineEvents.description: Myra's secret son, Niall Rafferty, enacts his revenge, culminating in a church explosion that kills his sister Tina Reilly.

timelineEvents.title: Jack & Darren's Fake Death Scam
timelineEvents.description: Facing financial ruin, Darren convinces Jack to fake his own death for insurance money, a plan that goes disastrously wrong.

timelineEvents.title: Theresa Murders Calvin Valentine
timelineEvents.description: In a shocking whodunnit, Theresa McQueen is revealed to have shot Calvin Valentine dead on his wedding day to her cousin Carmel.

timelineEvents.title: Jacqui McQueen's Rape
timelineEvents.description: In a powerful and sensitive storyline, Jacqui McQueen is raped by Gilly Roach, her husband's best friend.

timelineEvents.title: Silas Kidnaps Mercedes
timelineEvents.description: Serial killer Silas Blissett holds a pregnant Mercedes McQueen hostage in a terrifying storyline that grips the village.

timelineEvents.title: Jacqui Flees Hollyoaks
timelineEvents.description: After her husband Rhys dies in a bus crash, Jacqui gets into trouble with gangster Trevor Royale and is forced to flee the country.

timelineEvents.title: Birth of Oscar Osborne
timelineEvents.description: Darren and Nancy's son, Oscar, is born prematurely. He is later diagnosed with deafness, leading to a storyline about the family learning to cope.

timelineEvents.title: Murder of Dr. Browning
timelineEvents.description: Mercedes, Cindy, and Lindsey kill Mercedes' abusive husband Dr. Browning in self-defense and cover up the murder.

timelineEvents.title: Oscar's Cochlear Implant
timelineEvents.description: After much family debate and fundraising, Oscar Osborne successfully undergoes cochlear implant surgery.

timelineEvents.title: John Paul's Rape Storyline
timelineEvents.description: In a groundbreaking and critically acclaimed plot, John Paul McQueen is raped by his student, Finn O'Connor.

timelineEvents.title: Train Crash & Death of Carmel
timelineEvents.description: A party train for Porsche's wedding derails in a spectacular crash. Carmel McQueen dies heroically while saving Theresa from Sonny Valentine.

timelineEvents.title: Mercedes Fakes Her Death
timelineEvents.description: Following the train crash, Mercedes McQueen is apparently murdered, only to be revealed alive months later, having faked her death.

timelineEvents.title: Tom Becomes a Father
timelineEvents.description: Tom Cunningham and Peri Lomax are at the center of an underage pregnancy storyline, resulting in the birth of their daughter, Steph.

timelineEvents.title: Pete's Historical Abuse Revealed
timelineEvents.description: Porsche McQueen reveals that her mother's boyfriend, Pete Buchanan, sexually abused her and her sister Cleo as children.

timelineEvents.title: The Osbornes Lose The Dog
timelineEvents.description: After nearly 20 years, the Osborne family permanently loses ownership of The Dog in the Pond, their iconic family business and home.

timelineEvents.title: Death of Celine McQueen
timelineEvents.description: Celine McQueen becomes a victim of her ex-boyfriend, serial killer Cameron Campbell, after she discovers his secrets.

timelineEvents.title: John Paul Leaves for Singapore
timelineEvents.description: Long-running character John Paul McQueen leaves the village for a new life and teaching job in Singapore, where he reunites with Craig Dean.

timelineEvents.title: Jack's Murder Confession
timelineEvents.description: Jack Osborne confesses a dark secret from his past to Darren: he was involved in a murder with his half-brother years ago.
